name: After University
description:
You've graduated from university, but your path is shrouded in uncertainty. Rejections pile up, and even your mother, the person you seek comfort from, turns her back, branding you a disappointment. Alone and adrift, despair seems unending.

But hold on! Out of nowhere, an unexpected opportunity emerges. Your uncle offers you his long-shuttered doner restaurant. This place holds the memories of his past, and now, it's your chance to shape its future. This city offers a fresh start, but you've got three life goals: Achieve Career Success, Get Married, and Earn Respect. Your journey of transformation begins now.





Get hands-on as you grill mouthwatering doners and serve hungry customers. Your goal is to keep the orders coming and the customers happy. Quick, tasty, and satisfying – you're the doner master!




Take that old, rundown restaurant and give it a much-needed makeover that'll knock everyone's socks off! Change the interior, exterior, and furniture, and make it the go-to place for food and vibes.






Time to build your team! Hire kitchen and cleaning staff to lighten your load. Don't want to be tied to the kitchen all the time? Hire food stands like hot dogs or ice cream carts to earn extra cash passively.






Remember Amy, your crush from the old university days? She lives in this city too! With every surge in popularity, you earn the privilege to take her on dates. As you hire new staff or embark on romantic endeavors, you'll engage in conversations and your responses will affect your relationship with them!





Every satisfied customer and restaurant upgrade contributes to your ascent to stardom. The more popular you become, the greater your opportunities. Enjoy more frequent customers, relish delightful dates with Amy, and watch as once-persistent gangsters evolve into financial partners as moneylenders – no longer demanding 'protection' money daily. Your journey of success continues with these exciting transformations!
